channel.title: [PI] How to Make it So That You Can Only Take One

item.title: [PI] How to Make it So That You Can Only Take One
item.dc:creator: @adamknightz adamknightz
item.description:
@adamknightz wrote:

What if it isn’t a God Cape? You can already only take one of the god capes. I’m asking for another item. Like for a fish (Unusual Fish).

Would I put “Fish” there?

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How to Make it So That You Can Only Take One

item.title: [PI] How to Make it So That You Can Only Take One
item.dc:creator: @Ecstacy_Pkz Ecstacy Pkz
item.description:
@Ecstacy_Pkz wrote:

I’ll give you a hint

PlayerSave.java:

Search For:

} else if (token.equals("character-rights")) { p.playerRights = Integer.parseInt(token2);

Under that add:

} else if (token.equals("GodCape")) { p.Starter = Integer.parseInt(token2);

The rest is easy

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] How to Make it So That You Can Only Take One
item.dc:creator: @EzioAuditori EzioAuditori
item.description:
@EzioAuditori wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=EzioAuditori link=topic=477995.msg3498000#msg3498000 date=1297488263]

		case 27253:
			{
			c.sendMessage ("You take a fish from the fish tank");
			c.getItems().addItem(6202, 1);
			}  else if (item.amount >= 1) { 
			c.getItems().removeItem(6202, 1);
			}
		break;

TRY THIS?

[/quote]Ummm. No…[/quote]

l o l smiley face

item.title: [PI] How to Make it So That You Can Only Take One
item.dc:creator: @adamknightz adamknightz
item.description:
@adamknightz wrote:

How do you make it so that you can only take one of an item from an object? For example, the god cape you get from the statues in the wilderness.

Here’s my code:

		case 27253:
			c.sendMessage ("You take a fish from the fish tank");
			c.getItems().addItem(6202, 1);
		break;

Here’s the cape that you can only get 1 per person:

		case 2874:
			if (!c.getItems().ownsCape()) {
				c.startAnimation(645);
				c.sendMessage("Zamorak blesses you with a cape.");
				c.getItems().addItem(2414, 1);
			}

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How to Make it So That You Can Only Take One
